Sentencas: GdxCe1-xO2- (GDC) nanoparticles were synthesized, using continuous hydrothermal flow synthesis.
Titulo: Continuous hydrothermal flow synthesis of Gd-doped CeO2 (GDC) nanoparticles for inkjet printing of SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: By varying the synthesis conditions, particle size and morphology could be tailored.
Titulo: Continuous hydrothermal flow synthesis of Gd-doped CeO2 (GDC) nanoparticles for inkjet printing of SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Here, particle sizes between 6 and 40 nm with polyhedral or octahedral shape could be obtained.
Titulo: Continuous hydrothermal flow synthesis of Gd-doped CeO2 (GDC) nanoparticles for inkjet printing of SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Gd0.2Ce0.8O2- nanoparticles were further processed into inks for inkjet printing.
Titulo: Continuous hydrothermal flow synthesis of Gd-doped CeO2 (GDC) nanoparticles for inkjet printing of SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Despite the small particle size/large surface area, inks with excellent printing behavior were formulated.
Titulo: Continuous hydrothermal flow synthesis of Gd-doped CeO2 (GDC) nanoparticles for inkjet printing of SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: For proof-of-concept, thin GDC layers were printed on a) green NiO-GDC substrates, and on b) presintered NiO-YSZ substrates.
Titulo: Continuous hydrothermal flow synthesis of Gd-doped CeO2 (GDC) nanoparticles for inkjet printing of SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: While no dense layers could be obtained on the green NiO-GDC substrates, GDC nanoparticles printed on NiO-YSZ substrates formed a dense continuous layer after firing at 1300 degrees C.
Titulo: Continuous hydrothermal flow synthesis of Gd-doped CeO2 (GDC) nanoparticles for inkjet printing of SOFC electrolytes
